main.name: Sai Sriram Gundepalli
main.occupation: A Tech Enthusiast and Software Engineer Focused on Crafting Efficient, Secure & Scalable Applications !!!
main.bio: Hi there! I'm a software engineer with expertise in frontend & backend development. Passionate about cloud technologies & System Design.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me. Feel free to contact!

education.school: JNTUK University College of Engineering Vizianagaram
education.degree: Bachelor Of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering

description.description1: • Designed intuitive UI/UX wireframes and mockups in Figma, transforming complex concepts into user-friendly designs.

description.description2: • Built responsive, dynamic interfaces with React 18.2.0, and TypeScript 5.4.3, ensuring seamless user engagement.

description.description3: • Developed robust back-end services using Node.js 20.9.0, and Express.js 4.19.1 enabling efficient data handling and secure API integrations.

description.description1: • Developed an engaging Single-Page Application (SPA) to modernize the banking experience through HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), and Angular 13, resulted in a notable increase in customer interaction levels of up to 30%.

description.description2: • Implemented responsive design techniques across platforms, enhancing user experience and leading to a 25% increase in overall traffic and a 10% boost in conversion rates.

description.description3: • Architected secure microservices using Java 8 and Spring Boot 2.7.0, leading to a 40% decrease in response time for RESTful Web Services.

description.description4: • Optimized data processing pipeline using Java Streams API and lambda expressions, reducing processing time by 40% and improving code maintainability with 30% fewer lines of code.
